description:
As Takeru destroys the Towers of the Four Gods one by one, Seimei chooses to personally face him in combat.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Fight Me for Real! Takeru vs. Seimei, Souls Going Mano a Mano
Honki de Naguriae! Takeru vs Seimei, Tamashii no Taiman!!
本気で殴り合え! タケルVS晴明, 魂のタイマン!!
